front.title: Application Server Process (ASP) Extension (ASPEXT) Framework for Signalling User Adaptation Layers

abstract.t: This Internet-Draft describes ASP Extensions (ASPEXT) for Signalling User Adaptation Protocols [M2UA], [M3UA], [SUA], [IUA], [DUA], [V5UA], [GR303UA], [ISUA], [TUA], which permits cooperating Signalling Peer Processes (SPPs) to indicate to each other the specific protocol extensions that each supports.
